scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web -c cyan,magenta "npm -w @stacktrail/server run dev" "npm -w @stacktrail/web run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w @stacktrail/sdk run build && npm -w @stacktrail/server run build && npm -w @stacktrail/web run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -R packages/server/dist/* dist/ && cp packages/server/package.json dist/package.json && rm -rf dist/public && mkdir -p dist/public && cp -R packages/web/dist/* dist/public
scripts.typecheck: npm -w @stacktrail/sdk run typecheck && npm -w @stacktrail/server run typecheck && npm -w @stacktrail/web run typecheck
